name: Fiends And Friends (Yrllow)
description:
Controls: A and D, Arrow Keys, Or Basic Controller Input. Click to Attack, Open, or Interact.

This is a game based on the theme "recovery". I used this theme after the fight sequence with the friend counter on the HUD, every monster defeated releases a friend that you can collect!

This is the first game that I've ever created. I'm honestly proud of it, even though I know it's not very good. I'm happy to say I participated in a game jam for the first time in my life, as well as fleshed out an idea that I had, and brought together multiple people to create assets. 

This has been a major learning opportunity and I look forward to participating in jams in the future!
